data.sentence: The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: swallowing food after chewing, means of subsistence, devoured/consumed, fed/supplied, things to be eaten, eatables
data.sentence: The word يَأْكُلُهُ comes from the root ا ك ل and is associated with the meanings: swallowing food after chewing, means of subsistence, devoured/consumed, fed/supplied, things to be eaten, eatables

data.meanings: To do wrong, commit a mistake or error, commit a sin or crime or act of disobedience for which one deserves punishment, commit a fault or offense (intentionally or unintentionally), pursue a wrong way (intentionally or otherwise), cause to miss or pass over, miss a thing (or fail of hitting it), miss or deviate from, far or out of reach, cause one to make a mistake, feign a wrong action/mistake/error.
data.sentence: The word الْخَاطِءُونَ comes from the root خ ط ا and is associated with the meanings: To do wrong, commit a mistake or error, commit a sin or crime or act of disobedience for which one deserves punishment, commit a fault or offense (intentionally or unintentionally), pursue a wrong way (intentionally or otherwise), cause to miss or pass over, miss a thing (or fail of hitting it), miss or deviate from, far or out of reach, cause one to make a mistake, feign a wrong action/mistake/error.
